show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Polypill
content: The Polypill for primary prevention?! <!--more--> The downside of testing kids for high cholesterol How to manage a hiatal hernia to prevent esophageal cancer How Europe plans to prevent cardiovascular disease How music strengthens the brain 20-20 tips The Stone Maxine on, “If my body was a car” Callers Dorothy from South Carolina: MRSA infections Walter from Manhattan: How about hydrochloric acid for hiatal hernias
